header.title: A list of open normativity issues

section.title: Background
section.p: The immediate background for this list is the meeting of the Lule Sámi language board meeting. The list will be relevant also after this meeting, though. It is a key document to the normativity issued faced by the sámi spellchecker program, and lists open normativity issues.

section.title: Even and contracted stemtypes in nom. and gen./acc. when joined with pos. suffix
section.p: The normative grammars are far from precise in this issue with respect to stem-vowel change and central consonant gradation in each case.
